posts.title: Connecting fittings
posts.content:
It is used for connecting pipes, connecting valves, dampers or other pipe parts.
Fitting is a detachable connection consisting of a threaded neck, a conical neck, a nut and a seal, possibly supplemented by a blind nut. It is available in sizes DN 10 - DN 150. Types of supplied fittings: DIN, ISO, SMS, Hygienic DIN 11853, Aseptic DIN 11864.
Clamp joint is the same detachable joint, connected by a stainless steel sleeve, types of clamp connections: DIN, SMS
Flange connection is a detachable connection, which is connected by screws
Types of connecting flanges: flat flanges PN10, neck flanges PN10, PN 16, Hygienic
neck flanges PN 10 (DIN 11853), Aseptic neck flanges PN 10 (DIN 11864)
Hose extensions serve as hose ends and use a connection of two hoses, or as a transition between pipe and hose.
Garola joint is a simple joint of pipes or hoses made of sheet metal by pressing.
